identity.name: FOTIVA
identity.mission: Create a top 1% SaaS platform for photographers that blends the precision of Linear with the elegance of Stripe.

usage_rules.sidebar: Must use #2C3E50 background. Text must be white/light gray.
usage_rules.actions: Primary actions use Green (#4A9B6E). Secondary actions use outline or ghost styles.
usage_rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN on buttons. Allowed subtly on hero backgrounds only.
usage_rules.contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use dark text on light backgrounds, white text on dark backgrounds.

buttons.primary: bg-[#4A9B6E] text-white hover:bg-[#3D8B5E] rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm hover:shadow-md active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-gray-200 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-gray-900 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-colors

cards.dashboard: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow p-6
cards.feature: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 p-8 hover:border-[#4A9B6E]/20 transition-colors

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-[#4A9B6E] focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

sidebar.container: w-64 bg-[#2C3E50] text-white h-screen fixed left-0 top-0 flex flex-col border-r border-[#34495E]
sidebar.link: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 text-gray-300 hover:text-white hover:bg-[#34495E] rounded-lg transition-colors mx-2

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-end SaaS for photographers. The design must be impeccable. Do not cut corners on spacing or typography.
instructions_to_main_agent.sidebar_implementation: The sidebar is fixed. Ensure the main content has 'ml-64' (margin-left) to avoid overlap on desktop. On mobile, use a sheet/drawer.
instructions_to_main_agent.charts: Use Recharts. Style them to be minimal. Remove grid lines if possible, or make them very subtle (#E5E7EB). Use the primary green for the main data series.
instructions_to_main_agent.tables: Use Shadcn Table component. Style headers with uppercase, smaller font, and muted text. Rows should have hover effects.
instructions_to_main_agent.forms: Use React Hook Form + Zod. Validation messages should be clear and red. Success states should be green.
instructions_to_main_agent.animations: Use Framer Motion for page transitions (opacity/y-axis slide). Use 'AnimatePresence' for list items (events, payments).
instructions_to_main_agent.mock_data: Generate realistic mock data for the dashboard (Brazilian names, R$ currency, realistic dates).
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links, cards).

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry. Use whitespace aggressively.
universal_guidelines.dark_mode: The sidebar is always dark. The main content is light. Do not implement a global dark mode toggle unless specifically asked, as the brand identity relies on this contrast.
universal_guidelines.micro_interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click. Links should have a subtle underline animation.
universal_guidelines.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for floating elements like a sticky header or a toast notification.
